text: Henrik Pedersen (born 10 June 1975) is a former Danish football player. He played as a striker for Silkeborg IF, Bolton Wanderers and Hull City and played three games for Denmark national team. ==Club career statistics== |- |1995–96||rowspan="7"|Silkeborg||rowspan="7"|Superliga||12||4 |- |1996–97||2||0 |- |1997–98||15||9 |- |1998–99||33||16 |- |1999–2000||28||13 |- |2000–01||32||18 |- |2001–02||5||1 |- |2001–02||rowspan="6"|Bolton Wanderers||rowspan="6"|Premier League||11||0 |- |2002–03||33||7 |- |2003–04||33||7 |- |2004–05||27||6 |- |2005–06||21||1 |- |2006–07||18||1 |- |2007–08||Hull City||League Championship||21||4 |- |2008–09||rowspan="2"|Silkeborg||First Division||22||13 |- |2009–10||Superliga|||| 149||74 164||26 313||100 |} ==International career statistics== |- |2000||1||0 |- |2001||0||0 |- |2002||0||0 |- |2003||0||0 |- |2004||2||0 |- !Total||3||0 |} ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Premier League players
